subject: Re: Hello dear,
body:
That's fine, I need your attention before I email you about my idea, please
hear me out, I need your total devotion and trust to see this through. My
name is Peggy, I am from Hong Kong, I studied banking and finance, I am a
BSc holder, currently working at a bank. I have seen an account that
doesn't have a kin to claim the funds, I want you to know that in an issue
of inheritance, the next of kin can be anybody, it is not mandatory to be
related, you must wonder why I need your help. This is because I can't get
my friends or family members to help me because my bank will know that
there is a connection between us. But if it's a neutral body they will
release the funds as soon as possible. If you agree to help me we can
achieve success with the professionalism of a reputable Law Firm that I
have hired. It doesn't even matter if you are from different countries, the
most important thing is there must be documents stating that you can claim
the funds.

The reason I want us to claim this fund, Is because if we don't get it, at
the expiration of 20 years the funds will revert to the Hong Kong
government, and wouldn't be put into any good because they do that all the
time. Please believe me and you will not regret it as everything will be
done legally, we will share the funds at 50% each. The account owner is no
more and he doesn't have a kin to inherit the $9M  USD. Reply and say
"DEAL" in the email, then I will send you more details containing my IDs
and Pictures and how we can do this without facing any legal problems.

Sincerely,
Peggy.
